title: my wifi stopped
body: my wifi stopped suddenly and i had to leave my game... and i got afk boost :( please release it.

replies.body:
It's sucks that you didn't get to finish the game you were in and ended up with a leaverbuster, but we won't be able to remove any penalties in this case. This is because there are still 4 other players on your team that didn't have their 5th member. Feel free to look through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways you can improve your connection and stay in the game!

Hit me back up if you've got any other issues.
